```{r libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

```{r reading data}
#if user does not already have the data, download it.  Then, load it.  Data is split into two sheets, one for the Republicans and one for the Constitution Party.
#The second sheet also has some extra data that we will discard.  We're using range to discard this data and excess cells with whtiespace orother extraneous inputs.
#Download code recycled from *name*'s general election tidying.
if(file.exists("input/16Pres_pri_stwd_cnty.xlsx") == FALSE) {
  url <- *url*
  download.file(url, "input/16Pres_pri_stwd_cnty.xlsx") 
}

initial_gop_data <- readxl::read_xlsx("input/16Pres_pri_stwd_cnty.xlsx", range = "President!A6:N50")
initial_con_data <- readxl::read_xlsx("input/16Pres_pri_stwd_cnty.xlsx", range = "Voting Stats!A6:D50")
```
